DOC.brief_summary: To analyze whether statistically significant difference modification present uterine cervix 6 hour administration misoprostol 50 µg vaginal versus sublingual route .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Vaginal Sublingual Misoprostol 50 µg Cervical Ripening Prior Induction Labor
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , single blind clinical trial , perform . Inclusion criterion pregnant woman admit Pereira Rossell Hospital Center gestational age 32/0 41/6 accord first trimester sonogram , viable fetus cephalic presentation , estimate fetal weight lower 4000 gr , without contraindication vaginal birth , induction labor misoprostol previously indicate , 8 20 hour 7 day week . Protocol count approval Ethics Commission Pereira Rossell Hospital . All participant give write informed consent study begin . Once confirmation patient meet inclusion criterion , information give consent form sign , patient enter study intervention randomize . Randomization computer generate permuted block 2 epidemiologist Service , result seal opaque envelope open time administer medication . Prior administration medication , Obstetrician Obstetrics resident familiar administration route assign patient assessed vaginal examination characteristic cervix term Bishop score . Afterwards , technician investigation team administer misoprostol accord assign route ( 50 µg misoprostol vaginal sublingual ) . Tachysystole define presence least 6 uterine contraction 10 minute . Primary result define clinically significant variation ( least 2 point ) Bishop score 6 hour administration 50 µg misoprostol . Secondary result define presence tachysystole , frequency vaginal birth cesarean section , frequency new dos need continue induction labor frequency labor diagnose 6 hour administration misoprostol . Neonatal result include Apgar score 1 5 minute pH value umbilical cord gasometry . Final analysis make accord intention treat . In order detect difference mean Bishop score 2 point , use standard deviation 2 , 90 % power , reach confidence interval 95 % , population 49 patient require group . Randomization do permute block 2 , use table randomized number . Group 1 include patient receive sublingual misoprostol group 2 patient receive vaginal misoprostol . Analysis do statistical package SPSS ( reg ) V16 . For continuous variable mean standard deviation describe ; categorical variable absolute frequency percentage describe . For statistical analysis 2-tiled independent t-test use , order compare mean two group . Also , chi-squared test Fisher´s exact test use compare proportion among two group corresponds .
DOC.criteria: All pregnant woman admit Pereira Rossell Hospital Center Gestational age 32/0 41/6 accord first trimester sonogram A viable fetus cephalic presentation Estimated fetal weight lower 4000 gr Without contraindication vaginal birth Whom induction labor misoprostol previously indicate , 8 20 hour 7 day week . Does meet inclusion criterion .
